get.description:
Requires JWT Bearer token from V1 authentication endpoint.

Example:
Authorization: Bearer {your_jwt_token}

Get token from: POST /api/v1/authentication/login

requestBody.description: User update request with optional data and roles

items.description: List of items in the current page

totalCount.description: Total count of items across all pages

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there's a previous page

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there's a next page

AlertaInventarioDtoPagedResult.description: Generic paged result for API responses

CajaDetalladaDto.description: DTO for detailed cash register closure information including payments and user details

nombre.description: Name of the caracteristica (e.g., "King Size Bed")

icono.description: Optional icon path for the caracteristica

hasIcon.description: Indicates if the caracteristica has an icon image

iconUrl.description: URL to access the icon image

CierreBasicoDto.description: DTO for basic closure information in the list

CierreConPagosDto.description: DTO for a single cash closure with its payments

transacciones.description: List of all transaction details including payments, cancellations, and expenses

CierreDetalleCompletoDto.description: DTO for complete cash register closure details including payments, canceled reservations, and expenses

pagosSinCierre.description: Payments that haven't been included in any closure yet

CierresConPagosDto.description: DTO for cash closures with detailed payment information and pending payments

CierresConPagosPaginadosDto.description: DTO for paginated cash closures with payments

CierresyActualDto.description: DTO for closures and current pending transactions response

ConsumoCreateDto.description: DTO for creating a new consumo

montoInicial.description: Initial amount in the cash register

observacion.description: Optional observations about the cash register opening

CrearCajaDto.description: DTO for creating a new cash register entry

EgresoDetalleDto.description: DTO for expense details in cash register closure

HabitacionBulkStatsDto.description: DTO for statistics and bulk operations

HabitacionCategoriaCreateDto.description: DTO for creating a new HabitacionCategoria

institucionId.description: Institution ID this category belongs to

activo.description: Indicates if the category is active (not deleted)

numeroHabitaciones.description: Number of rooms in this category

activo.description: Indicates if the category should be active or inactive

HabitacionCategoriaUpdateDto.description: DTO for updating an existing HabitacionCategoria

HabitacionLibreDto.description:
Minimal DTO for habitaciones libres - contains only essential data
Estimated 70% data reduction compared to HabitacionCompleteDto

HabitacionOptimizedDto.description:
Optimized DTO for habitaciones with minimal data for better performance
Use this for general habitacion listings where detailed information is not needed

InventoryItemSummaryDto.description: DTO for individual inventory item summary

InventorySummaryDto.description: DTO for inventory summary by location

items.description: List of items in the current page

totalCount.description: Total count of items across all pages

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there's a previous page

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there's a next page

MovimientoInventarioDtoPagedResult.description: Generic paged result for API responses

PagoDetalladoDto.description: DTO for detailed payment information including related business data

PagoDetalleCompletoDto.description: DTO for payment with complete details including room and consumption information

PromocionCreateDto.description: DTO for creating a new promotion

PromocionUpdateDto.description: DTO for updating an existing promotion

fechaFin.description: Reservation end date and time (optional - if not provided, calculated from duration)

totalMinutos.description: Total minutes for the reservation (additional to hours)

esReserva.description: Indicates if this is a reservation (true) or walk-in (false)

ReservaCreateDto.description: DTO for creating a new reservation

pausaHoras.description: Optional fields - only include when they have values

ReservaOptimizedDto.description:
Optimized DTO for reserva data with only used fields
Removed: MontoTotal, MovimientoId, FechaRegistro

caracteristicaIds.description: List of caracteristica IDs to assign to the room

RoomCaracteristicaAssignmentDto.description: DTO for assigning caracteristicas to a room

approved.description: Indicates if the transfer is approved

detalleIds.description: Approve specific items only (if not provided, approves all)

procesamientoAtomico.description: Process all transfers atomically (all or nothing)

prioridadPorDefecto.description: Default priority for all transfers if not specified

requiereAprobacionPorDefecto.description: Default approval requirement if not specified

items.description: List of items in the current page

totalCount.description: Total count of items across all pages

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there's a previous page

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there's a next page

TransferenciaInventarioDtoPagedResult.description: Generic paged result for API responses

numeroTelefono.description: Optional fields - only include when they have values

VisitaOptimizedDto.description:
Optimized DTO for visita data with only used fields
Removed: FechaIngreso, FechaSalida, ClienteId, FechaRegistro
Note: Removed reservaActiva field to avoid duplication (it's in the main object)

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
